channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gavin Newsom Rolls the Dice
item.description: California’s governor hopes that his new gerrymander will help his 2028 presidential prospects.

item.title: Trump administration halts visas for people from Gaza after Laura Loomer questions arrivals

item.title: Reviving the Presidential Fitness Test Is Worth a Shot
item.description: Critics of Trump’s move seem unable to separate their criticisms from their politics.

item.title: The Left Can’t Stop Self-Destructing
item.description: Democrats are once again denying the obvious, this time about D.C.’s crime problem, to ‘resist’ Trump. But they’re wrong — I should know.

item.title: A Kennedy Center for the Whole Country?
item.description: With the line between ‘art’ and ‘entertainment’ blurred, Trump’s Kennedy Center seeks to give its audiences a bit of both.

item.title: America Should Celebrate Its Heroes
item.description: The president has rightly recognized the narrow, almost exclusive concentration on victims in our culture of commemoration — and seeks to reverse it.

item.title: ‘Nobody Deserves That’: Mom Of D.C. Crime Victim Says Nation’s Capital Needs Intervention
item.description: Congressional intern Eric Tarpinian-Jachym died because D.C.'s local leadership isn't willing to enforce the law.

item.title: Report Exposes How Gender-Extremism Group Pressures Hospitals To Damage Children
item.description: The report explains how the Human Rights Campaign pressures hospitals into child castration to service 'transgender' ideology.

item.title: DC Attorney General Sues Feds To Stop Trump Admin From Cleaning Up Crime
item.description: 'It is my opinion that the Bondi Order is unlawful, and that you are not legally obligated to follow it,' Schwalb said.
